title: Colorized Trait Parameters
description: Configuration contract for Colorized trait semantics.

colorStates.description: Semantic tone keys defining the palette of status colors. Maps to --cmp-status-{tone}-* tokens.

contrastLevel.description: WCAG contrast compliance target for all color pairings.

colorMode.description: How color_state values resolve to tokens: semantic (system layer) or custom (object-specific).

fallbackTone.description: Tone applied when a status value cannot be resolved to a known color state.
